action.content:
You are playing a text adventure game. I will describe what you can perceive in the game. You write the single action you want to take in the game starting with >. Only reply with an action.
For example:
> open cupboard

You can have up to two objects in your inventory at the same time.

Your goal for this game is: Put the book on the table, the plate on the table and the mop on the table.

Once you have achieved your goal, write "> done" to end the game.

You are in a bedroom now. There are a bed, a wardrobe and a pillow. The wardrobe is closed. The pillow is on the bed. There is a passage to a hallway here.
You can't see the wardrobe's contents because it is closed. The wardrobe is openable and currently closed.
The wardrobe is now open. The wardrobe is empty.
You are in a hallway now. There is a potted plant. The potted plant is on the floor. There are passages to a bedroom, a broom closet, a kitchen and a living room here.
You are in a kitchen now. There are a cupboard, a counter and a plate. The cupboard is closed. The plate is on the counter. There are passages to a pantry and a hallway here.
You take the plate. In your inventory you have a plate.
You can't go to a bedroom from here.
You are in a hallway now. There is a potted plant. The potted plant is on the floor. There are passages to a bedroom, a broom closet, a kitchen and a living room here.
You are in a broom closet now. There are a mop and a broom. The mop is on the floor. The broom is on the floor. There is a passage to a hallway here.
You take the mop. In your inventory you have a mop and a plate.
You can't go to a kitchen from here.
You are in a hallway now. There is a potted plant. The potted plant is on the floor. There are passages to a bedroom, a broom closet, a kitchen and a living room here.
You are in a kitchen now. There are a cupboard and a counter. The cupboard is closed. There are passages to a pantry and a hallway here.
The cupboard is now open. The cupboard is empty.
You can't see a book here.
You can't go to a bedroom from here.
You are in a hallway now. There is a potted plant. The potted plant is on the floor. There are passages to a bedroom, a broom closet, a kitchen and a living room here.
You are in a kitchen now. There are a cupboard and a counter. The cupboard is open. There are passages to a pantry and a hallway here.
You can't see a book here.
You can't go to a living room from here.
You can't go to a bedroom from here.
You are in a hallway now. There is a potted plant. The potted plant is on the floor. There are passages to a bedroom, a broom closet, a kitchen and a living room here.
You are in a broom closet now. There is a broom. The broom is on the floor. There is a passage to a hallway here.
You can't see a book here.
You can't go to a kitchen from here.
You can't go to a bedroom from here.
You are in a hallway now. There is a potted plant. The potted plant is on the floor. There are passages to a bedroom, a broom closet, a kitchen and a living room here.
You are in a living room now. There are a shelf, a side table, a table, a couch, a chair and a book. The book is on the side table. There is a passage to a hallway here.
Your inventory can not hold more than two objects at the same time.
You can't see a inventory here.
Your inventory can not hold more than two objects at the same time.
You can't see a inventory here.
Your inventory can not hold more than two objects at the same time.
You can't see a inventory here.
Your inventory can not hold more than two objects at the same time.
You can't see a inventory here.
Your inventory can not hold more than two objects at the same time.
You put the book on the table.
The plate is already in your inventory.
You put the plate on the table.
The mop is already in your inventory.
